updater.util
Class HTTPDownloader

java.lang.Object
  updater.util.HTTPDownloader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interruptible, Pausable
public class HTTPDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pausable, Interruptible

The HTTP downloader.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing

Field Detail

protected final java.util.List<java.lang.Runnable> interruptedTasks
List of tasks to be executed after interrupted.

pause

protected boolean pause
Indicate currently is paused or not.

resumeFile

protected java.io.File resumeFile
If not null, downloader will try to download the file with start position according to the downloaded length of resumeFile.

outputTo

protected java.io.OutputStream outputTo
The content to output to. Note if resumeFile is set, the downloader will not output to this stream.

ifModifiedSince

protected long ifModifiedSince
The If-Modified-Since header value, -1 means not set.

protected boolean downloading
Indicate if currently is downloading a file.

download

public DownloadResult download(DownloadProgressListener listener,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               java.lang.String fileSHA256,
                               int expectedLength,
                               int retryTimes,
                               int retryDelay)
                        throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Download.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to listen to download progress, can be null
url - the URL to download from
fileSHA256 - the expected SHA-256 checksum of the final downloaded file, null means not specified
expectedLength - expected file size in bytes to download, -1 means no specified
retryTimes - the maximum allowed retry times
retryDelay - the time to sleep between retries, should >= 0 (in milli seconds)
Returns:
the result
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - URL is invalid

retry

protected DownloadResult retry(DownloadResult result,
                               boolean truncateResumeFileOnRetry,
                               DownloadProgressListener listener,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               java.lang.String fileSHA256,
                               int expectedLength,
                               int retryTimes,
                               int retryDelay)
                        throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Retry the download.

Parameters:
result - the reason to retry
truncateResumeFileOnRetry - whether truncate the resumeFile on retry or not
listener - see download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int, int)
url - see download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int, int)
fileSHA256 - see download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int, int)
expectedLength - see download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int, int)
retryTimes - see download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int, int)
retryDelay - see download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int, int)
Returns:
the retry result
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
